wikipedia_page.main: Shaun Charles Close (born 8 September 1966) is an English former association football centre forward. He started his career as a youth player for Tottenham Hotspur, then had a spell with Halmstad in Sweden and after that, spent a season at Bournemouth. In 1989, he was signed by Swindon Town manager Osvaldo Ardiles,  In 1993, he spent a season with Barnet, before moving down to non-league with Bishop's Stortford. In his later years took up Lawn Bowls and became quite proficient.
